Creating an Account
===================

To register for a trial account with Stratifyd, go to portal.stratifyd.com and click on "Create a new account"


.. image:: login.png


**Existing Customers:**
If your organization already has a Stratifyd enterprise license, you can simply go to


https://your-organization-name.stratifyd.com


and create an account with your company e-mail and password. 


.. image:: newaccount.png

Should you have any questions, please send a note to our Client Support Team or clientsupport@stratifyd.com.
